de.hsa.games.fatsquirrel.core

Class FlattenedBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsa.games.fatsquirrel.core.FlattenedBoard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BoardView, EntityContext

    public class FlattenedBoard
extends java.lang.Object
implements BoardView, EntityContext
    The Class FlattenedBoard is a mirror of the Board Object itself and is used for the view (gui).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FlattenedBoard(Board board)
      Instantiates a new flattenedboard for the view.

        public void spawnChild(MasterSquirrel parent,
                       XY direction,
                       int energy)
                throws NotEnoughEnergyException
        Description copied from interface: EntityContext
        This Method spawns a miniSquirrel from a MasterSquirrel.
        Specified by:
        spawnChild in interface EntityContext
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent MasterSquirrel.
        direction - the direction in which the miniSquirrel should spawn in.
        energy - the energy of the miniSquirrel at spawn.
        Throws:
